boardgame.name: Battleground
Battleground: Fantasy Warfare
Battleground: Historical Warfare
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; GAME SYSTEM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This entry is to allow for discussion/rating of the game system as a whole. It is not for a specific product or release. Versions will appear on the individual item pages._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battleground: Fantasy Warfare is a point-based table-top tactical wargame in which units are represented by cards instead of a collection of figures or models. We bring you all the charging, flanking and intricate maneuvering of a great wargame in a convenient package for a fraction of the cost._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As the general of a fantasy army of Men, Orcs, Elves or whatever faction you choose, you will muster your forces and command them in battle. You will have an agreed-upon number of points to spend on your army, which will determine the size of the battle. You and your opponent will then take turns deploying your forces on the battlefield. Finally you will give them their orders and the battle begins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During play you will have a limited number of Command Actions each turn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; one for every 500 points available for building your army. These Command Actions represent what you can do as a general. You can spend them to change a unit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s orders or take direct control of a unit for a turn, rally routed units, draw cards that can provide small combat bonuses or to use your special army ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Unlike most tabletop wargames where you have complete control over every soldier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s actions, Battleground puts you in the role of a true general. Your troops are loyal and will obey your orders but you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t be everywhere so you have to spend your resources carefully!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Your Move Games* *This listing is for 1 set only. The following sets are available, contact us to specify which pack(s) you want and what quantity: Your Move Games (YMG 004) $10.49 [Men of Hawksford Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 005) $10.49 [Men of Hawksford Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 006) $10.49 [Undead Army Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 007) $10.49 [Undead Army Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 008) $10.49 [Orc Army Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 009) $10.49 [Orc Army Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 010) $10.49 [Elves of Ravenwood Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 011) $10.49 [Elves of Ravenwood Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 012) $10.49 [Dwarves of Runegard Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 013) $10.49 [Dwarves of Runegard Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 014) $10.49 [Umenzi Tribesmen Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 015) $10.49 [Umenzi Tribesmen Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 016) $10.49 [Terrain Pack] Your Move Games (YMG 017) $10.49 [Lizardmen Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 018) $10.49 [Lizardmen Reinforcements] Your Move Games (YMG 020) $10.49 [High Elves Starter] Your Move Games (YMG 021) $10.49 [High Elves Reinforcements] ** Battleground: Fantasy Warfare is a point-based miniatures game – but without the miniatures. Battleground uses cards rather than painted models to represent your forces. This means a much lower price as well as easier transportation and setup, but don’t be fooled – this is not a “light” war game or a CCG. Battleground is a serious, award-winning wargame that will challenge you at every step, from army design and deployment to tactical maneuvers and command decisions until battle’s end. What you Get Each Battleground army comes in two different decks. • Army Starters contain eighteen unit cards, a thirty-card Command Deck and two quickstart reference cards, plus the basic rules. This gives you all the cards you need to get started – in play terms, each unit card is the equivalent of a boxed set of miniatures. • Army Reinforcement decks each contain fifty unit cards – enough for almost any army you can imagine – and the advanced rules. Reinforcement decks also include two unit types not available in that army’s Starter. All you need in addition is a flat surface, an opponent, some dice and a couple of dry-erase markers.

Have a large set to sell: Men of Hawkshold, Dwarves, Elves, Undead and Orcs. Both Starter Decks and Reinforcement Decks for all, 10 deck in total. The Undead and Elves have been removed from shrink to look at, the rest are unopened. None have been played with (so no pen has been used). PLUS Scenario Booklet and Terrain Pack. Terrain has been cut out. It all comes in a nice wooden box for storage. US shipping in Flat Rate Priority Box - $8.95

Battleground uses cards rather than painted models to represent your forces. This means a much lower price as well as easier transportation and setup, but don’t be fooled – this is not a “light” war game or a CCG. Battleground is a serious, award-winning wargame that will challenge you at every step, from army design and deployment to tactical maneuvers and command decisions until battle’s end. What you Get Each Battleground army comes in two different decks. • Army Starters contain eighteen unit cards, a thirty-card Command Deck and two quickstart reference cards, plus the basic rules. This gives you all the cards you need to get started – in play terms, each unit card is the equivalent of a boxed set of miniatures. • Army Reinforcement decks each contain fifty unit cards – enough for almost any army you can imagine – and the advanced rules. Reinforcement decks also include two unit types not available in that army’s Starter. All you need in addition is a flat surface, an opponent, some dice and a couple of dry-erase markers.

Your Move Games* Please contact us on selection and quantity. Your Move Games (YMG 016) $9.49 [Battleground: Terrain Pack] Your Move Games (YMG 002) $2.99 [Battleground: Dice Pack] ** Terrain Pack Battleground: Fantasy Warfare Terrain Pack is a new support product to enhance that already great game play with art by David Lloyd! This terrain pack is printed on laminated cardstock to give you terrain that combines beauty and durability. You can write on the terrain with wet or dry-erase marker and then wipe clean at end of play. Although designed for use with Battleground: Fantasy Warfare, this pack can be used with most tabletop wargames or to set the scene in RPGs. Dice Pack Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t forget Your Move Games dice! You know you want them... just for the dragon... admit it.

Played with once or twice, really only a few of the cards. I have both the Rome vs Carthage Starter Pack, also the Rome vs Carthage Reinforcement pack. So this is essentially everything this game offers at this time. Both Games are complete, and in excellent condition, this listing is for both of them. This would likely be quite cheap to ship as well. In a padded envelope or small flat rate maybe. Buyer prepays plus USPS priority mail shipping. If I can find a different box, or you order many games, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to combine shipping or make a special trip to the post office for parcel post, but for just a couple games, or a single game, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m going to use the free boxes for priority mail. If we can beat flat rate depending upon your location, we will, but many times flat rate does tend to be the least expensive.

Have only played once with 2 of the decks, cards is excellent condition It includes 5 armies of the Battleground Fantasy Warfare Universe: 1) Men of Hawkshold (starter) 2) High Elves (starter) 3) Undead Army (starter) 4) Monsters and Mercenaries at £5 each 5) Dark Elves at £10 What you get for free: -- 50 12mm 6-sided dice (25 red, 25 black) which you will need as there is a lot of dice rolling (similar to miniatures games) -- 2 whiteboard marker pens (erasable) to help you mark the cards to keep track of damage -- Wipe cloth (for wiping out marker ink from cards) Will only ship to UK addresses. Shipping cost is £3.78 with MyHermes (2-day delivery)

This is a bulk lot of several faction sets and supplements for the Battleground Fantasy Warfare game. The packs are opened with cards sorted and collected by type back into original boxes by faction. Boxes are in excellent condition with minor wear, cards and rule books are unplayed. Included in the lot are: Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Dwarves of Runegard (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Elves of Ravenwood (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: High Elves (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Lizardmen (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Men of Hawkshold (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Monsters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mercenaries (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Orc Army (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Umenzi Tribesmen (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Undead Army (starter and reinforcement pack) Battleground: Fantasy Warfare Terrain Pack (appears to be 2 packs, one with terrain cut out and one uncut, unless the original product had 2 copies of each sheet) Battleground Fantasy Warfare: Scenario Booklet (back half has curve fold in pages, might be possible to flatten/straighten back out) Battleground: Kingdoms Set of 9 dragon logo dice produced by publisher for the game, new in pack For shipping this is considered a medium size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
